Title: Requires the review of the bylaws of certain resident councils to ensure compliance with federal and state law
Summary: Requires a municipal housing authority in a city having a population of one million inhabitants or more to review the bylaws of resident councils to ensure compliance with federal and state law.
LawCode: Add ยง62, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to requiring the review of the bylaws of certain resident councils to ensure compliance with federal and state law
